scripts.export: npm run build && tar -czf movement-miniapp-docs.tar.gz -C docs/.vitepress/dist . && echo '✅ Exported to movement-miniapp-docs.tar.gz'
scripts.export:versioned: npm run build && tar -czf movement-miniapp-docs-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).tar.gz -C docs/.vitepress/dist . && echo '✅ Exported with timestamp'
scripts.export:zip: npm run build && cd docs/.vitepress/dist && zip -r ../../../movement-miniapp-docs.zip . && cd ../../.. && echo '✅ Exported to movement-miniapp-docs.zip'
